title: They killed my first child with a stone in front of my eyes ðŸ’”
selftext: Imagine what she must have gone through in her entire life and what she'd be feeling right now since her all rapists were released by a mass murderer and a insensitive person called narendra modi, it makes me feel anguish and furious to see how narendra modi and BJP as ruined the entire country and made Indians morally corrupt. I can't see any light coming anywhere near. I feel sad I just hate bjp more than anything in this world and I hate their supporters even more than lundendra modi.
